markdownRemark.html:
1. A new side project requiring collection of names and email addresses
  2. No need for firebase or any serious backend
  3. Validating the idea
  4. Initially reached for google sheets as I consume this product daily
  5. Usually a fan of google’s API’s and documentation - but there was a bit too much effort with google sheets API
  6. Recalled air table from work at GA
  7. Up and running in minutes - incredible developer experience
  8. Here’s how I did it:
